extendedInfo.description: Why just play blackjack when you could also learn how to win at blackjack? From beginners to professional players, Advantage Blackjack makes it easy for you to practice your blackjack and card counting skills anywhere.Features:- Basic Strategy Trainer- Full Featured Card Counting Trainers- Realistic Practice Game with customizable hints- Test your abilities against others with the Challenge mode- Multiple Counting Systems- Options to tailor the Blackjack rules to your local casino- Easy to understand help filesPaid Only Features:- Ability to count 3+ cards at a time- Live play counting simulation- Unbalanced counting systems- User defined counting systems- Ad free- More to come!You will have everything you need to bring down the house!Permissions are for ad networks and the Android in-app purchase interface.

reviews.title: Best \'AP\' Android App Available
reviews.comment: Simple, intuitive, useful, flexible, and well-designed app for CC practice/drilling on-the-fly.  The available options make the paid version a no-brainer for \'AP\' Android users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Incredible app, easy to use, and straight forward. I would love to buy the full version but I just can\'t justify spending $5 to unlock two or three more features.
reviews.author: Sam Oleson

reviews.title: Great tools in here! Teaches you to play with a purpose.
reviews.comment: Maybe add a strategy table to study, not just in the detailed explanations.
reviews.author: Martin Stein

reviews.title: Great app, but counting bugs
reviews.comment: Far and away the best blackjack app I have found for features and configurability. However, there is a bug in the practice game in counting systems where suits matter, which is really annoying when trying to learn a counting system.
reviews.author: Jeff R

reviews.title: Outstanding. Period.
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Really helps you understand the fundamentals. Portability is great. Though I still recommend practicing with real cards as well.
reviews.author: Bryan Bijonowski

reviews.title: THE BEST
reviews.comment: This is the BEST free learning app for 21!!  Have tried a.few but others are very limited unless you pay.  The options are great too. Have learned an awful lot.  Would highly recommend.
reviews.author: Anita Lowe

reviews.title: Great learning app.
reviews.comment: Lots of info and, straightforward, user-friendly training programs. Very helpful for learning basic strategy and getting an intro to counting. The only minor thing I noticed is that I seem to lose depressingly often in the practice game, moreso than with other trainers or even live games. Don\'t know if it\'s expecting you to count and quit or just getting you used to that losing feeling.
reviews.author: B Han

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, just confused when it tells me my move was wrong half the time I win a hand...? If the apps point is to make me a better blackjack player, why does it want me to lose?  Otherwise, great app
reviews.author: Shane Schofield

reviews.title: Good but glitchy
reviews.comment: Marvellous for cc practice, except in the practice game mode where there are card value glitches depending on when a particular upcard appears. E.g. red seven count, black seven is counted as zero when it\'s the first player upcard, which is correct, but when it\'s the second it\'s counted as one?! This sort of nullifies any combined bettting strategy with counting practice and greatly reduces the value of the app. Please fix for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Bart Saaiman

reviews.title: Best blackjack basic trainer
reviews.comment: It\'s like flashcards for blackjack. Pick the rules, pick the type of hands, and then brush up your blackjack strategy.
reviews.author: Paul Byoun

reviews.title: Please Update!
reviews.comment: I would give this app 5 stars If it is Updated so under options for counting exercises for theTime Attack practice you have the option of choosing how many decks are dealt so you can practice counting more decks and still be under a certain time you have set it for. If this happens I will give it 5 stars! Other wise this is exactly what I was looking for to practice my card counting skills instead of having a deck of cards on my pocket all the time. Love the different features on here. Please Update!!
reviews.author: Nick Gentile

reviews.title: Must for counters
reviews.comment: Great simple app, a must if your a card counter and don\'t want to carry around cards with you just to practice.
reviews.author: Dylan Milroy

reviews.title: Most comprehensive blackjack app I\'ve seen for android
reviews.comment: My only complaint is that the menu buttons disappear until the screen is touched, but that touch actually makes a selection, so I have to remember/guess where a certain menu item would be.
reviews.author: George Blake

reviews.title: Simple and fast
reviews.comment: The ads are very unobtrusive and the game operates very quickly and smoothly. I like it a lot!
reviews.author: Todd Mason

reviews.title: Very nice app!
reviews.comment: So far, flawless.  Great way to hone your game.
reviews.author: Mike George

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work as well on my Samsung s3 as it did on my HTC thunderbolt.
reviews.author: Michael Hayes

reviews.title: Awesome but..........
reviews.comment: Best tool I\'ve used for counting cards and basic strategy. ..app would be basically perfect if you could play MULTIPLE SPOTS and included DEVIATION from basic strategy
reviews.author: Ross Causing

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: One of the best for practicing blackjack. Quick and direct answers when playing the odds incorrectly. Plenty of options in the free version. Thank you to the people who made this.....
reviews.author: Jeffrey Klein

reviews.title: Best counting practice on android
reviews.comment: Period.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: really good trainer especially if you just want to drill softs or splits.  counting is missing from free version though
reviews.author: A Google User
